alert.note: Alert for Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:56PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Santa Rosa County through 245 PM CDT... At 156 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Roeville, or 4 miles northeast of Milton, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milton, Bagdad, Point Baker, Pea Ridge and Roeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
